Self.Wiki:
Defines weapon types and each affinity.
Includes arrows and bolts. Responsible for scaling shown on certain consumables.
IDs not ending in a multiple of 100 are ignored.
Permitting affinities on a weapon without affinity rows at the correct IDs will result in the nearest 10000 being used.
SpEffects specified here can be modified by upgrades in ReinforceParamWeapon.

behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Used to determine the action parameters to use for this weapon's attacks.

sortId.Wiki: The ordering ID used to sort this part in the menu.

wanderingEquipId.Wiki: Replacement equipment ID for wandering ghosts.

weaponWeightRate.Wiki:
Affects animation recovery timing (such as dodging or follow-up attacks) via TAE event 300.
Higher values mean slower recovery, lower values mean faster recovery.
Values determine how much of the early recovery event (if present) is not active, from 0% to 100%.
Effects of values will be dependent on the length of the early recovery event.
1 = 100% (slowest), .5 = 50% (half), 0 = 0% (fastest)

fixPrice.Wiki: The price required to repair this part. Repair cost is calculated using this and durabilityMax

basicPrice.Wiki: The reinforcement price for this part.

sellValue.Wiki: The sell value for this part.

correctStrength.Wiki: The multiplier to the damage corrected by this specified stat.

correctAgility.Wiki: The multiplier to the damage corrected by this specified stat.

correctMagic.Wiki: The multiplier to the damage corrected by this specified stat.

correctFaith.Wiki: The multiplier to the damage corrected by this specified stat.

physGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when this weapon is guarding.

magGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when this weapon is guarding.

fireGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when this weapon is guarding.

thunGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when this weapon is guarding.

spEffectBehaviorId0.Wiki: A SpEffect to apply to the victim when this weapon hits.

spEffectBehaviorId1.Wiki: A SpEffect to apply to the victim when this weapon hits.

spEffectBehaviorId2.Wiki: A SpEffect to apply to the victim when this weapon hits.

residentSpEffectId.Wiki: A SpEffect to apply to the wielder of this weapon.

residentSpEffectId1.Wiki: A SpEffect to apply to the wielder of this weapon.

residentSpEffectId2.Wiki: A SpEffect to apply to the wielder of this weapon.

materialSetId.Wiki: The material requirements for improving this equipment.

originEquipWep.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep1.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep2.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep3.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep4.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep5.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep6.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep7.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep8.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep9.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep10.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep11.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep12.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep13.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep14.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

originEquipWep15.Wiki: The source ID when this equipment is reinforced to this level.

antiDemonDamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier applied to targets that are classified with isDemon.

antSaintDamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier applied to targets that are classified with isWeakSaint.

antWeakA_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier applied to targets that are classified with isWeakA

antWeakB_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier applied to targets that are classified with isWeakB

vagrantItemLotId.Wiki: The item lot to use when this item is dropped and generates a vagrant.

vagrantBonusEneDropItemLotId.Wiki: The item lot to use when this item is dropped and generates a vagrant.

vagrantItemEneDropItemLotId.Wiki: The item lot to use when this item is dropped and generates a vagrant.

equipModelId.Wiki: The model ID to use for this equipment.

iconId.Wiki: The icon ID to use for this equipment.

durability.Wiki: The initial durability of this equipment.

durabilityMax.Wiki: The maximum durability of this equipment.

attackThrowEscape.Wiki: The base damage for throw attack power

parryDamageLife.Wiki: The duration of parry damage. It is capped by the duration set in the TAE. In frames.

saDurability.Wiki: The additional poise to apply when using this weapon during attack animations.

guardAngle.Wiki: Defense generation range angle when guarding with a weapon (horizontal direction). In degrees.

staminaGuardDef.Wiki: Defense power against stamina drain from enemy attacks when guarding correctly.

reinforceTypeId.Wiki: The reinforcement progression to use for this equipment.

trophySGradeId.Wiki: The achievement ID this equipment is associated with, if any.

trophySeqId.Wiki: The sequential achievement ID this equipment is associated with, if any.

throwAtkRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to critical hits.

bowDistRate.Wiki: Increase the attentuation range of ammunition by the specified multiplier.

equipModelCategory.Wiki: The equipment model category used by this equipment.

equipModelGender.Wiki: The equipment gender category used by this equipment.

weaponCategory.Wiki: The weapon category of this equipment.

wepmotionCategory.Wiki: The weapon animation category. Determines the base animation set the weapon uses.

guardmotionCategory.Wiki: The weapon animation category used when guarding. Determines the animation set to overlap when guarding.

atkMaterial.Wiki: Specify the particles and sounds to apply to the victim at the time of attack.

defMaterial.Wiki: Specify the particles and sounds to apply when guarding against an attack.

defSfxMaterial.Wiki: The particles to apply when guarding against an attack.

correctType.Wiki: Determine the calculcation correction graph to use when correcting damage.

spAttribute.Wiki: Special attributes to set for attacks

spAtkcategory.Wiki: The weapon override animation category. Determines the override animation set the weapon uses.

wepmotionOneHandId.Wiki: The weapon idle animation category. Determines the idle animations used when held one-handed.

wepmotionBothHandId.Wiki: The weapon idle animation category. Determines the idle animations used when held two-handed.

properStrength.Wiki: The required level of the specified stat to properly wield this weapon.

properAgility.Wiki: The required level of the specified stat to properly wield this weapon.

properMagic.Wiki: The required level of the specified stat to properly wield this weapon.

properFaith.Wiki: The required level of the specified stat to properly wield this weapon.

attackBaseParry.Wiki: The base parry attack damage value. Applied to the enemy parry defense value.

defenseBaseParry.Wiki: The base parry defense value. Compared against enemy parry attack value.

guardBaseRepel.Wiki: The base repel value when guarding. If a blocked attack has a repel attack value less than the repel defense value, the attack will bounce.

attackBaseRepel.Wiki: The base repel value when attacking. If the victim has a repel defense value greater than the repel attack value, the attack will bounce.

guardCutCancelRate.Wiki: Guard cut rate invalidation ratio (-100 to 100) Normal at 0 / Completely invalidated at -100 / Doubles the defense effect of the opponent at 100 -50, 100% cut shield becomes 50% cut Become

guardLevel.Wiki: When guarding, the guard animation offset to use when being attacked.

slashGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

blowGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

thrustGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

poisonGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

diseaseGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

bloodGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

curseGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

isDurabilityDivergence.Wiki: The offset to apply to the animation set based on durability.

rightHandEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this equipment can be equipped in the right weapon slot.

leftHandEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this equipment can be equipped in the left weapon slot.

bothHandEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this equipment can be equipped in either weapon slot.

arrowSlotEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this equipment can be equipped in arrow ammunition slot.

boltSlotEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this equipment can be equipped in bolt ammunition slot.

enableGuard.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will guard with L1 when equipped with left hand.

enableParry.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will arry with L2 when equipped with left hand.

enableMagic.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will cast magic when attacking.

enableSorcery.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will cast sorcery when attacking.

enableMiracle.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will cast miracles when attacking.

enableVowMagic.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will cast vow magic when attacking.

isNormalAttackType.Wiki: The attack type for menu display.

isBlowAttackType.Wiki: The attack type for menu display.

isSlashAttackType.Wiki: The attack type for menu display.

isThrustAttackType.Wiki: The attack type for menu display.

isEnhance.Wiki: If ON, this weapon be buffed via a tool or spell.

isLuckCorrect.Wiki: If ON, applies attack correction based on humanity.

isCustom.Wiki: If ON, this weapon can be reinforced via the reinforcement mechanic.

disableBaseChangeReset.Wiki: If ON, prevents the weapon from being changed fundamentally via the ascension mechanic or infusion mechanic.

disableRepair.Wiki: If ON, this weapon cannot be repaired.

isDarkHand.Wiki: If ON, this weapon is considered a 'Dark Hand'.

simpleModelForDlc.Wiki: If ON, this weapon uses a simple model for the DLC.

lanternWep.Wiki: If ON, this weapon is considered a light source.

isVersusGhostWep.Wiki: If ON, this weapon can hit 'Ghost' characters.

baseChangeCategory.Wiki: The weapon job category (e.g. ascension or infusion). Used to display the attribute icon.

isDragonSlayer.Wiki: If ON, is considered a 'dragon-hunter' weapon.

isDeposit.Wiki: If ON, this item can be deposited into the repository.

disableMultiDropShare.Wiki: If ON, this item cannot be dropped in a multiplayer session.

oldSortId.Wiki: The ordering ID used to sort this part in the menu.

levelSyncCorrectID.Wiki: Determines the level sync calculation correction parameters to apply for this weapon in multiplayer.

Option.Name: One hand down and behind hip
